name: Videography Simulator
description:
Videography Simulator

is a small sim game about shooting videos!

Note: exporting a gif DOES work, but it might take a long time (10-15 seconds). if prompted by chrome to kill the page, please click "wait"

  • [SPACE] raise/lower camera
  • [Click and Hold] record footage
  • [Q] to export gif of footage (can take a long time)
  • [R] to rewind/rest the tape
  • [E] to interact with sign
  • [F] toggle fullscreen, 
  • [H] to toggle help text

Made in 1 week for Haxejam 2021 Winder Edition

  • Art direction and programming - drewby
  • additional assets - sparkhur
